import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Box, Heading, FormControl, FormLabel, Input, Textarea, Button, Select, Divider, NumberInput, NumberInputField, NumberInputStepper, NumberIncrementStepper, NumberDecrementStepper, Radio, RadioGroup, Stack, Flex, } from '@chakra-ui/react'; const CoursePostingForm = () => { const [title, setTitle] = useState(''); const [author, setAuthor] = useState(''); const [image, setImage] = useState(''); const [date, setDate] = useState(''); const [category, setCategory] = useState(''); const [description, setDescription] = useState(''); const [price, setPrice] = useState(''); const [level, setLevel] = useState('beginner'); const handleSubmit = event => { event.preventDefault(); // handle form submission here }; return ( Option 1 Option 2 Option 3 Title of Course

Your course landing page is the page first seen by a user or an intending learner when the click your course. Make sure it is compelling enough to drive learners to enroll in your course.

Course Title setTitle(event.target.value)} /> Course Description setAuthor(event.target.value)} /> Image URL setImage(event.target.value)} /> Date setDate(event.target.value)} /> Category Description
